# Park Hôtel Lubumbashi

## About
Park Hôtel is a 77-room hotel located at Avenue Munongo n°50 in the center of Lubumbashi, Democratic Republic of Congo. It offers comfortable accommodations, a restaurant serving Congolese and European cuisine, a spa, meeting rooms, a bar, and 24/7 reception and ATM services.

## Contact
- Phone: +243 997 032 330
- Email: info@parkhotelcongo.com
- Address: Avenue Munongo n°50, Lubumbashi, RDC
- Website: https://parkhotelcongo.lovable.app

## Services
- 77 comfortable rooms (Standard, Superior, Le Jardin)
- Restaurant: Congolese & European cuisine (Breakfast 6-10h, Lunch 12-15h, Dinner 18-22h)
- Spa: Hot stone massage, facials, aromatherapy, body treatments
- Meeting rooms with projector and Wi-Fi
- Bar & Lounge
- 24/7 Reception
- 24/7 ATM

## Booking
Reservations can be made via the website, by phone (+243 997 032 330), WhatsApp, or email (info@parkhotelcongo.com).
